policy.name: Policy for service #23429152, Dummy for Context Variables test
policy.xml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><wsp:Policy xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy" xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:EchoRoutingAssertion/> <L7p:EmailAlert> <L7p:TargetEmailAddress stringValue="gateway@devssg1.l7tech.com"/> <L7p:Subject stringValue="tc2.14.12.4: hardcoded context variables for nonsoap "/> <L7p:Base64message stringValue=""/> <L7p:SmtpHost stringValue="localhost"/></L7p:EmailAlert> </wsp:All> </wsp:Policy>
